RULE_TYPE.TEMPLATE_SQL: select c.config_field_id as "Config Field ID", c.config_field_name as "Config Field Name", x.xitor_type as "Xitor Type", lbl_pref.label_text || lbl_cf.label_text as "Field Label", c.config_field_id as "Config Field Id", dt.type_name as "Data Type" from config_field c join xitor_type x on x.xitor_type_id = c.xitor_type_id join config_field_data_type dt on dt.config_field_data_type_id = c.data_type left join vw_label lbl_cf on c.app_label_id = lbl_cf.label_id and lbl_cf.app_lang_id = :p_lang_id left join vw_label lbl_pref on x.prefix_label_id = lbl_pref.label_id and lbl_pref.app_lang_id = :p_lang_id where c.is_static = 0 or c.config_field_name in ('XITOR_KEY','XITOR_CLASS_ID')

Rule of this type will be Executed Every 1 Hour

Rule of this type will be Executed Every 1 Hour
이 유형의 규칙은 매 1 시간마다 실행됩니다

RULES_ITEM.SQL_TEXT:
declare v_current_date date := to_date(to_char(current_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), 'MM/DD/YYYY'); v_project_id number; v_project_key varchar2(4000); v_email varchar2(4000); begin if trunc(current_date) <> trunc(current_date,'HH24') then return; end if; for cur in (select x.xitor_id, x.xitor_key, u.email from xitor x join config_value_number cvn1 on (cvn1.key_value = x.xitor_id and cvn1.config_field_id = id.action_items.cf.act_enable_notifications and cvn1.value_number = 1) join config_value_number cvn2 on (cvn2.key_value = x.xitor_id and cvn2.config_field_id = id.action_items.cf.act_action_status and cvn2.value_number = 10023835) join config_value_number cvn3 on (cvn3.key_value = x.xitor_id and cvn3.config_field_id = id.action_items.cf.act_action_assigned_to and cvn3.value_number is not null) join users u on (u.xitor_id = cvn3.value_number) join config_value_date cvd on (cvd.key_value = x.xitor_id and cvd.config_field_id = id.action_items.cf.act_future_notification_date and cvd.value_date = v_current_date) where x.xitor_type_id = id.action_items.tt) loop v_project_id := util.getparentbyid(cur.xitor_id, id.project.tt); if v_project_id is not null then v_project_key := util.getvalstrbyid(v_project_id, id.project.cf.xitor_key); end if; v_email := cur.email; for rec in (select u.email from config_value_mult cvm join users u on (u.xitor_id = cvm.value_number) where cvm.key_value = cur.xitor_id and cvm.config_field_id = id.action_items.cf.act_action_followers) loop v_email := v_email || ', ' || rec.email; end loop; util.sendmail('OneVizion - Action Item Notification', 'This Action Item record has reached the scheduled notification date. Please complete the open action item.
OneVizion Link: ' || pkg_rpt.get_trackor_edit_url(cur.xitor_id) || '
Action ID: ' || cur.xitor_key || '
Parent Record(s): ' || v_project_key || '
Action Name: ' || util.getvalstrbyid(cur.xitor_id, id.action_items.cf.act_action_item_name) || '
Status: ' || util.getvalstrbyid(cur.xitor_id, id.action_items.cf.act_action_status) || '
Category: ' || util.getvalstrbyid(cur.xitor_id, id.action_items.cf.act_action_category) || '
Priority: ' || util.getvalstrbyid(cur.xitor_id, id.action_items.cf.act_priority) || '
Department: ' || util.getvalstrbyid(cur.xitor_id, id.action_items.cf.act_department_owner) || '
Due / Forecast Date: ' || util.getvaldatebyid(cur.xitor_id, id.action_items.cf.act_due__forecast_date) || '
Future Notification Date: ' || util.getvaldatebyid(cur.xitor_id, id.action_items.cf.act_future_notification_date) || '
Action Assigned To: ' || util.getvalstrbyid(cur.xitor_id, id.action_items.cf.act_action_assigned_to) || '
Action Comments: ' || util.getvalstrbyid(cur.xitor_id, id.action_items.cf.act_action_comments) || '
---', '', v_email, null, null, 'html'); end loop; end;

T_BPD_ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Nightly rule that sends email notifications that are queued up for that night in the Action Item tracker.
T_BPD_ITEM.NAME: Action Item Notification Nightly

RULE_TYPE.TEMPLATE_SQL: select c.config_field_id as "Config Field ID", c.config_field_name as "Config Field Name", x.xitor_type as "Xitor Type", lbl_pref.label_text || lbl_cf.label_text as "Field Label", c.config_field_id as "Config Field Id", dt.type_name as "Data Type" from config_field c join xitor_type x on x.xitor_type_id = c.xitor_type_id join config_field_data_type dt on dt.config_field_data_type_id = c.data_type left join vw_label lbl_cf on c.app_label_id = lbl_cf.label_id and lbl_cf.app_lang_id = :p_lang_id left join vw_label lbl_pref on x.prefix_label_id = lbl_pref.label_id and lbl_pref.app_lang_id = :p_lang_id where c.is_static = 0 or c.config_field_name in ('XITOR_KEY','XITOR_CLASS_ID')

T_LABEL.LABEL_TEXT: Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Executed when a Field's value is changed.

RULES_ITEM.SQL_TEXT:
begin for rec in ( select x.xitor_id from xitor x join config_value_char cvc on cvc.key_value = x.xitor_id and cvc.config_field_id = id.action_items.cf.act_age_of_last_update and cvc.value_char is not null join config_value_number cvn on cvn.key_value = x.xitor_id and cvn.config_field_id = id.action_items.cf.act_action_status and cvn.value_number <> id.vt.v_act_action_status.opened where x.xitor_type_id = id.action_items.tt and x.xitor_id = :pk ) loop util.setvalcharbyid(rec.xitor_id, id.action_items.cf.act_age_of_last_update, null); end loop;
for rec in ( select x.xitor_id, cvd.value_date from xitor x join config_value_date cvd on cvd.key_value = x.xitor_id and cvd.config_field_id = id.action_items.cf.act_time_last_update and cvd.value_date is not null join config_value_number cvn on cvn.key_value = x.xitor_id and cvn.config_field_id = id.action_items.cf.act_action_status and cvn.value_number = id.vt.v_act_action_status.opened where x.xitor_type_id = id.action_items.tt and x.xitor_id = :pk ) loop if round((current_date - rec.value_date) * 24 * 60) >= 1440 then util.setvalcharbyid(rec.xitor_id, id.action_items.cf.act_age_of_last_update, to_char(round((current_date - rec.value_date))) || ' Days'); elsif round((current_date - rec.value_date) * 24 * 60) >= 60 then util.setvalcharbyid(rec.xitor_id, id.action_items.cf.act_age_of_last_update, to_char(round((current_date - rec.value_date) * 24)) || ' Hours'); else util.setvalcharbyid(rec.xitor_id, id.action_items.cf.act_age_of_last_update, to_char(round((current_date - rec.value_date) * 24 * 60)) || ' Minutes'); end if; end loop; end;

AUTOMATIONS_ITEM.DESCRIPTION:
Sets [ACT_ACTION_STATUS] to [Closed] when [ACT_FINISH_DATE] is NOT NULL,
to [Open] when [ACT_FINISH_DATE] is NULL
Sets [ACT_ACTION_CREATED_DATE] to [[date]] when [ACT_ACTION_ITEM_NAME] is NOT NULL
Sets [ACT_ACTION_CREATED_BY] to [[user]] when [ACT_ACTION_CREATED_DATE] is NOT NULL
Sets [ACT_ACTION_ITEM_NAME] to Lock when [ACT_ACTION_CREATED_DATE] is NOT NULL

SEC_ROLES_ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Access to the Action Items Vizion Package
